title: Regulations, 1964 to 2022 and these Regulations may be cited together as the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Superannuation (Designation
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Superannuation (Designation 

of Approved Organisations) Regulations, 2023. 

(2) The Superannuation 

(Designation of Approved Organisations) 
Regulations, 1964 to 2022 and these Regulations may be cited together as the 
Superannuation (Designation of Approved Organisations) Regulations, 1964 to

title: Regulations, 1964 to 2022 and these Regulations may be cited together as the
Regulations, 1964 to 2022 and these Regulations may be cited together as the
heading: 2. The organisations specified in the Schedule to these Regulations are
text_raw:
2. The organisations specified in the Schedule to these Regulations are 
hereby designated as approved organisations for the purposes of Section 4 of the 
Superannuation and Pensions Act, 1963 (No. 24 of 1963).
text_norm: 2 organisation specified schedule regulation hereby designated approved organisation purpose section 4 superannuation pension act 1963 (no 24 1963)

title: Regulations, 1964 to 2022 and these Regulations may be cited together as the
heading: Approved Housing Bodies Regulatory Authority
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Approved Housing Bodies Regulatory Authority 

Charities Regulatory Authority 

Digital Hub Development Agency 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

14 September, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [455] 3

title: Regulations, 1964 to 2022 and these Regulations may be cited together as the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Section 4 of the Superannuation and Pensions Act, 1963 provides for the transfer 
of pensionable service in the case of staff transfers between the Civil Service and 
“approved organisations”, and between one “approved organisation” and 
another. These regulations designate the organisations set out in the schedule as 
“approved organisations”. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [455]
